dialogue.htmlContent:
Letting out a triumphant chuckle, [scarlett.name] continues to thrust [scarlett.her] [scarlett.cock+] in and out of your [pc.asshole+] as [scarlett.she] asks, [scarlett.speechNoEffects(You like that, bitch?! ~Mmm!~ Tell me what you are!)]

Letting out a deep [pc.moan], you submissively tell the [scarlett.race] what [scarlett.she] wants to hear, [pc.speechNoEffects(~Ooh!~ I'm a dirty buttslut!)]

I'm fucking busy here!)]

Scarlett's hostile exclamation effectively dissuades the customer from coming any closer, and after watching them turn around and walk off, the raven harpy draws back a little and hisses down at you, #IF(scarlett.hasPenis()) [scarlett.speechNoEffects(Keep sucking, bitch!)] #ELSE [scarlett.speechNoEffects(Get that tongue working again, bitch!)] #ENDIF

#IF(scarlett.hasPenis()) Suddenly thrusting her [scarlett.cock+] down your throat, Scarlett calls out to an approaching customer, #ELSE Suddenly bucking her hips forwards and smothering your mouth with her [scarlett.pussy+], Scarlett calls out to an approaching customer, #ENDIF [scarlett.speechNoEffects(Fuck off and bother one of the other harpies!)]

Clearly not wanting to argue with such a hostile harpy, the customer scurries off, leaving Scarlett to draw back a little and hiss down at you, #IF(scarlett.hasPenis()) [scarlett.speechNoEffects(Go on, bitch, keep sucking my cock!)] #ELSE [scarlett.speechNoEffects(Go on, bitch, get your tongue in deep!)] #ENDIF

Apparently, you've just been extremely rude to them. What do you have to say for yourself?)]

[scarlett.speechNoEffects(Ah! S-Sorry, Helena! I didn't mean to be so rude!)] the raven harpy quickly apologises, doing her best to hide the tone of arousal in her voice.

Thankfully, Helena seems to be oblivious as to what's happening beneath the counter in front of her, and after sharply scolding her subordinate, she lets out an exasperated sigh and asks, [helena.speechNoEffects(So did [pc.name] leave earlier? I thought [pc.she] would have come and said goodbye to me...)]

[scarlett.speechNoEffects(Yes, but I'm sure [pc.she]'ll be back soon,)] Scarlett says #IF(scarlett.hasPenis()) as she slowly grinds the base of her cock against your [pc.lips]. #ELSE as she slowly grinds her wet cunt against your [pc.lips]. #ENDIF Without saying another word, you hear the beautiful matriarch turn on the spot and head off back into the store, leaving Scarlett to let out a soft laugh and hiss down at you, [scarlett.speechNoEffects(You hear that? Once I've finished with you, Helena'll be wanting to see you. Now hurry up and finish me off!)]
